note: • Market Scanner—Powerful tools that screen the market in real-time including:
title: • A variety of news services including the Dow Jones News Service and Broadtape. • Market commentary, fundamental analysis, historical charting, and company research are prepared daily by leading experts and wire services. • Advanced GET—Advanced charting package, including indicators such as Elliott waves for Types One and Two Trades, Ellipse, Make-or-Break, Expert Trend Locator, and False Bar Stochastics
Brokers meet at an outdoor marketplace in Philadelphia to buy and sell securities issued by the new U.S

note: giving birth to the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE).
title: Merchants who used to meet under a buttonwood tree on Wall Street in New York City organize America’s first formal exchange with membership requirements
unemployment stifle the U.S. and world economies
The Chicago Board of Trade forms the first listed options exchange, the Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE). This exchange is quickly copied by other exchanges around the world

The stock market crashes in October, sending the Dow nose-diving 22.6 percent. The DJIA drops 508 points from 2,246 to 1,738. Program trading restrictions and automatic trading curbs are instituted in an attempt to prevent future crashes
Online trading is launched over the Internet
Klein launches the first initial public offering (IPO) over the Internet for his microbrewery
Dow Jones hits-all time high of 11,722 on January 14
